name: Maria William
description: Screwdrivers are one of the most traditional of tools but are still indispensable for most electricians who frequently require access to electrical containers sealed with screws.

name: Jenny Clare
description: Their versatility means they can be used to accomplish a multitude of tasks requiring ‘torque’, working in a much more robust manner than would be possible with the use of bare hands alone.

name: Sarah Mark
description: It is also made from different materials, including PVC, vinyl, copper foil and glass cloth. Different varieties feature varying colours, widths, thicknesses, temperature tolerance, adhesion strength and insulating capabilities.
